chant about the deaths of America or

the Vienna agreement is another sign of

between friends of America and Friends

in Saudi Arabia our key Western allies
they're also Iran's most significant
regional adversaries and believe the

Eastern fault lines especially the

Sunnis and the saudi-iranian
cold war that helps to drive it even

Bowen BBC News
